questionTitle: The new manager explained to the staff that she hoped to ________ new procedures to save time and money.
The safety committee's report recommended that all medicines should be kept out of the ________ of children.
The manager ________ the men to return to work immediately.
On holiday I ________ always on the beach when the weather is fine.
Travelling to Paris ________ air is quicker than driving.
I'm not going to help you with your homework and neither ________ John.
"________ is a very good all-round exercise," the doctor told Susan.
The burglar ________ to open a window at the back of the house.
We ________ going to the concert. The orchestra was marvellous.
When she was crossing the room the night-nurse happened to notice the old lady ________ to get out of bed.
Although the town had changed in the ten years since he had last visited it, much of it was still ________ to him.
If you want to change the shirt that you bought, make sure that you keep the ________.
Deborah: When are they going to buy that house? Claudia: Didn't you know? They finally decided ________.
After the police had questioned him for 12 hours, Higgins broke ________ and confessed.
While studying he was financially dependent ________ his wife.
Luckily, he remembered ________ up with petrol, so he didn't run out.
I've looked ________ it everywhere, but I can't find it.
Switzerland is well-known for its impressive mountainous ________.
If they ________ to that party, they would certainly decide to attend it.
I will lend you this book tomorrow if I ________ it.
